info.name: One Tweet Feathers
info.description:
Shader was introduced in my production:
https://www.shadertoy.com/view/4dBBRV

Created from my experiments with built-in functions (max,cos,mix,length).
I haven't seen similar shape on Shadertoy, so I decided to publish it, now in 134 chars version.

renderpass.code: void mainImage(out vec4 c, vec2 f){vec2 a=5.*(2.*f-iResolution.xy)/iResolution.y;a=max(a,-a);c=vec4(9.-length(mix(a.x,a.y,9.*cos(a.x*a.y))),0,0,1);}
renderpass.name: Image
